00024 PlatformComponentItem::PlatformComponentItem(QSharedPointer<Component> component,
00025                                              QString const& instanceName,
00026                                              QString const& displayName,
00027                                              QString const& description,
00028                                              QMap<QString, QString> const& configurableElementValues,
00029                                              QGraphicsItem *parent)
00030     : SWComponentItem(QRectF(-100, 0, 200, 40), component, instanceName, displayName,
00031                       description, configurableElementValues, parent), hierIcon_(0), importedIcon_(0)
00032 {
00033     Q_ASSERT_X(component, "PlatformComponentItem constructor",
00034                "Null component-pointer given as parameter");
00035 
00036     updateComponent();
00037 }

00046 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 // Function: updateComponent()
00048 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 void PlatformComponentItem::updateComponent()
00050 {
00051     SWComponentItem::updateComponent();
00052 
00053     VLNV* vlnv = componentModel()->getVlnv();
00054 
00055     // Check whether the component is packaged (valid vlnv) or not.
00056     if (vlnv->isValid())
00057     {
00058         setBrush(QBrush(QColor(211, 236, 255)));
00059     }
00060     else
00061     {
00062         setBrush(QBrush(QColor(217, 217, 217)));
00063     }
00064 
00065     // Create a hierarchy icon if the component is a hierarchical one.
00066     if (componentModel()->getModel()->hasHierView())
00067     {
00068         if (hierIcon_ == 0)
00069         {
00070             hierIcon_ = new QGraphicsPixmapItem(QPixmap(":icons/graphics/hierarchy.png"), this);
00071             hierIcon_->setToolTip(tr("Hierarchical"));
00072             hierIcon_->setPos(-94, 6);
00073         }
00074     }
00075     else if (hierIcon_ != 0)
00076     {
00077         delete hierIcon_;
00078     }
00079 
00080     // Show an icon if this is an imported SW component.
00081     if (isImported())
00082     {
00083         if (importedIcon_ == 0)
00084         {
00085             importedIcon_ = new QGraphicsPixmapItem(QPixmap(":icons/graphics/imported.png"), this);
00086             importedIcon_->setToolTip(tr("Auto-synced"));
00087             importedIcon_->setPos(80, 6);
00088         }
00089     }
00090     else if (importedIcon_ != 0)
00091     {
00092         delete importedIcon_;
00093     }
00094 }
